thread.title: Great place to stay off the beaten path
thread.title_full: Great place to stay off the beaten path - Review of Hotel Residence Foch, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Brad T
title: Great place to stay off the beaten path
text: Stayed her 3 night with family of 4 for quick vacation in Europe. Very clean, newly and very nicely refurbished. Leave the sitting room with beds for children that had a separating door. Staff very helpful and very English friendly. It's a few km from most things a tourist wants to see but close enough to walk to most or we used Uber extensively with most rides being about 13â‚¬ which was much cheaper than renting and parking a car. You definitely don't want to drive in Paris if you're from anywhere else!
